body: Earlier today I reported a player for abusing glitches (Killing a player before the walls drop.) I have reported for this a few times and all the players got temp banned for a day or two. But today when I reported the moderator said "This is only warn/kick-able offense. However, we will keep an eye on him." So did this rule change?
body_tagged: Earlier today I reported a player for abusing glitches (Killing a player before the walls drop.) I have reported for this a few times and all the players got temp banned for a day or two. But today when I reported the moderator said "This is only warn/kick-able offense. However, we will keep an eye on him." So did this rule change?
title: Did this rule change?

replies.body: No, it was just a  warn/kick offence.

replies.body: Well players have been banned for it before. http://gyazo.com/899b65654ad75af58ea380582c40b3e4
